Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

calculateReward(address).details: Function to calculate trader's reward for her activities during periods

claimReward().details: Function to claim reward for spot trading activity. Transfer rewards on the balance in traderBalanceVault Emits SpotTradingClaimReward(address trader, uint256 amount)

decreaseRewardPerPeriod(uint256).details: Function to decrease reward per period. Only EMERGENCY_ADMIN can call it.

params._rewardPerPeriod: New value for reward per period, must be less than the current value

getPeriodInfo(uint256).details: Get information for the period corresponding to the given timestamp

params.timestamp: The timestamp to get information about

returns._0: totalReward Total reward for the corresponding period
returns._1: totalActivity Total activity for the corresponding period

getPeriodsWithTraderActivity(address).details: Function to get an array of period numbers when trader had any activity

returns._0: An array of period numbers with trader activity
A struct with activity and hasClaimed members

params.periodDuration: The duration of a reward period

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. This function can only be called by an address with the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setRewardPerPeriod(uint256).details: Function to set new reward per period. Only MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN can call it.

params.rewardPerPeriod: New value for reward per period

topUpUndistributedPmxBalance(uint256).details: Function to topUp the contract PMX balance

params.amount: PMX amount to add to the contract balance

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. This function can only be called by an address with the SMALL_TIMELOCK_ADMIN or MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role depending on the contract. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

updateTraderActivity(address,address,uin.details: Function to update spot trader activity. Only PM_ROLE can call it.

withdrawPmx(uint256).details: Function to withdraw PMX from the contract to treasuryOnly BIG_TIMELOCK_ADMIN can call it.

params.amount: Amount of PMX to withdraw from the contract
